definition: micron (one thousandth of a millimeter or 10^-6 meter)
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
millimicron or one-millionth of a millimeter

sentences.english: With deep submicron technology, crosstalk noise becomes more and more serious.
sentences.chinese: 隨着深亞微米技術，串擾噪聲問題越來越嚴重。

sentences.english: We have applyed it in submicron radiation-hard circuit successfully.
sentences.chinese: 並在亞微米的抗輻射加固電路中成功應用。

sentences.english: The ions, 40 micrometers apart, float above the surface of the trap.
sentences.chinese: 離子之間相隔40微米，漂浮在勢阱表面。

sentences.english: In the past, this has been accomplished utilizing mechanical devices such as calipers , micrometers, and the like.
sentences.chinese: 在過去，這已經完成利用機械設備，如卡鉗，微米等。

sentences.english: The nanotube was long   10 microns   and freely suspended.
sentences.chinese: 納米管有10微米長，並且自由懸浮。

sentences.english: Then a nut is screwed onto the molded-in stud and tightened with a torque of 6 Nm.
sentences.chinese: 然後堅果被擰緊鑄造在螺柱並且拉緊以扭矩6毫微米。

sentences.english: And, in this case, they had foil that was less than a micrometer thick.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的話，他們採用的箔的厚度小於一微米。

sentences.english: Nano-crystalline gra in exists in ore particle with micron size.
sentences.chinese: 微米級鐵礦粉具有納米尺度的晶粒。

sentences.english: Deep submicron IC design will bring many new challenges.
sentences.chinese: 深亞微米芯片設計的會帶來許多新的挑戰。

sentences.english: Calculation result demonstrates the energy consumption for preparing micron flake wood fiber is low.
sentences.chinese: 結果顯示，微米級長薄片木纖維切削功率較低。

sentences.english: On average, bacterias are about 1 micrometre long.
sentences.chinese: 細菌的平均長度大約1微米。

sentences.english: They then injected several-micron-diameter plastic microparticles.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他們注入一些微米級的塑料顆粒。

sentences.english: The Filtering precision can reach less than 5 microns. CATTE INDUSTRY CO.
sentences.chinese: 產品的過濾精度最小可達5微米以下。

sentences.english: The results of electronic microscope scanning of sub-micrometer patterns by far ultraviolet lithography are given.
sentences.chinese: 並給出遠紫外光刻亞微米級圖形的電鏡掃描照片結果。

sentences.english: The self - repair performance of micron copper in grease is evaluated with four - ball tester.
sentences.chinese: 通過四球試驗評價了微米銅在潤滑脂中的自修復作用。

sentences.english: The pillars are just six microns wide and three microns tall.
sentences.chinese: 這些欄柱只有六微米寬，三微米高。

definition: millimicron or one-millionth of a millimeter
nanosecond, ns, 10^-9 s (PRC)/Taiwan equivalent: 奈秒[nai4 miao3]
